tool_description: Verifies return eligibility against company policies including return windows, item conditions, and special restrictions.
error_messages: Invalid item_category: Category must exist in policy database.
Invalid purchase_date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and in the past.
Missing return_reason: Return reason cannot be empty.
Invalid item_condition: Condition must be a recognized condition state.
Invalid original_price: Price must be a positive number.
usage: Check policy compliance after item inspection and damage assessment. Provides definitive policy-based decision on return eligibility.

policy_compliant.description: Whether return meets all policy requirements

policy_violations.description: List of any policy violations found

eligible_refund_type.description: Type of refund eligible: full, partial, store_credit, exchange_only, none
